mapper.sql: LTId, Year, Place, LaCode, SmCode, SmName, LaTax
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_landtax where year = #{0} and place = #{1}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_landtax (LTId, Year, Place, LaCode, SmCode, SmName, LaTax) values (#{ltid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latax,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
